definition: a short lively tune played on brass instruments, grow vigorously
details:
noun
- a short lively tune played on brass instruments
= example: a short lively tune played on brass instruments
= synonyms: fanfare, tucket
- the act of waving
= synonyms: brandish
- a display of ornamental speech or language
- a showy gesture
= example: a showy gesture
- an ornamental embellishment in writing
verb
- grow vigorously
= synonyms: boom
- move or swing back and forth
= synonyms: wave
- make steady progress
= synonyms: thrive, fly high, prosper
